relation: Shaykh ul Islam ki Khidmat madina sharif ki yad me joomta huwa Salam. I have extreme love and respect for Shaykh ul Islam Dr Muhammad Tahir ul Qadri. i think He is the only person who can defend actual preaching of Islam worldwide at every field of life. Viva La Shaykh ul Islam. May Allah showers unlimited mercy upon Qibla Allama Dr Tahir ul Qadri. I LOVE YOU DR SAHIB... KEEP YOUR BLESSED EYES UPON ME.. WAQAS AHMED ATTARI RIYADH KSA.

textAfterTable: Name   : Mirqayoom Location   : Srinagar,india About Book   : The City of Medina and Visit to the Prophet’s Mausoleum Message   : Masha,allah book is very nice. Allah aap ko ziada sa ziada books lakheny key taufeeq ata farmayee. ameen Posted on   : Sat 28 Jan 2012   8:55:15 am Name   : sada jatoi Location   : Pakistan About Book   : The Light of Muhammad (PBUH): From Creation to Birth Message   : Subhan Allah. Dr sahab Allah apko lambi umar atta farmae aamen. nihayat shandar or tafseel se likhi hui book he. Allah sain apko ajar e azeem atta kare apne Pyare Habib S.A.W.W ke sadqy me.
